name: Peace Lily
description: The Peace Lily, known for its elegant white flowers, is a popular choice for indoor spaces.

name: Zanzibar Gem
description: The Zanzibar Gem, with its glossy green foliage, is a low-maintenance indoor plant perfect for beginners.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
description: A trendy plant with large, glossy leaves that makes a bold statement in any room.

name: Snake Plant
description: A hardy plant that thrives on neglect, perfect for beginners and air purification.

name: Pothos
description: Fast-growing trailing plant with heart-shaped leaves, great for hanging baskets or shelves.

name: Monstera Deliciosa
description: Known as the Swiss Cheese Plant for its split leaves, a favorite in modern interiors.
